content:
The representative of the Main Directorate of Intelligence of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine Vadim Skibitsky said that the large landing ship of the Russian invaders "Yamal" was struck by the Ukrainian marine drones of the GUR of Ukraine Magura V5.

This is stated inmessageGur.

According to Vadim Skibitsky, thanks to Magura V5, the Russian reconnaissance ship "Ivan Hurs", landing vessels "Shark" and "Serna", rocket ship "Ivanovets", a large landing ship "Caesar Kunikov" and patrol ship of the Russian Federation Cofts "Cerege, Cereg Cereg, was gone to the bottom. ”.

"They recently struck the ship repair plant of the Russian Federation in Sevastopol, where, among other things, a large landing ship of the enemy" Yamal "was rolled up," said GUR.

According to GUR, the Army of Yamal reportedIt is critical.
title: Guri revealed the way of defeating the Russian ship "Yamal"
description: This is stated in GUR. According to Vadim Skibitsky, thanks to Magura V5 on ...
author: Army Inform
